Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near Rhodes/68th
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st  buses temp. rerouted EB: 69th, State and 67th; WB: 67th, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, State and 67th.

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, State and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 87th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains continue to stand at 87th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains continue to stand at 87th due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested between 95th and Garfield to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #29 State or the #21 Cermak. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing 87th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line Line trains are running, but not stopping at 87th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line Line trains are running, but not stopping at 87th due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
